On this page

Organization Structure ​

Visual Overview ​

Publishing Services Overview ​

The Permissions Seeking function operates within Elsevier's Health Content Management (HCM) division:

  • Total Organization FTE: 60+
  • Permissions Seeking FTE: 19
  • Processes Handled: 12 different processes

Divisional Structure ​

Health Content Management (HCM)
├── Health Sciences (HS) Permissions
│   └── Copyrights Specialists
│
└── Science & Technology (S&T) Permissions
    └── Copyrights Specialists

Workflows Supported ​

Health Sciences (HS) ​

  • HS (Health Sciences)
  • Clinics
  • RREF
  • Translations
  • APAC
  • Nursing
  • Journals
  • E-products (IPOC, Mosby Skills, Clinical Key Essentials, etc.)

S&T Workflows ​

  • RREF
  • Hot Topics
  • MRW (Major Reference Works)

Geographic Distribution ​

Teams are distributed across multiple locations:

LocationFunction
Chennai, IndiaPrimary operations center
PhilippinesSupport operations
US/UKPublisher relations, escalations

Reporting Structure ​

VP, Health Content Management
└── Director, Publishing Services
    ├── Manager, HS Permissions
    │   └── HS Team Leads
    │       └── HS Specialists
    │
    └── Manager, S&T Permissions
        └── S&T Team Leads
            └── S&T Specialists

Cross-Functional Collaboration ​

Internal Partners ​

DepartmentCollaboration Type
EditorialContent requirements, timeline coordination
ProductionAsset delivery, file formats
LegalComplex rights issues, disputes
FinancePayment processing, budget management
TechnologySystem support, integrations

External Partners ​

Partner TypeRelationship
CCC (Copyright Clearance Center)License clearing, RightsLink
PublishersRights negotiations, bulk agreements
AuthorsDirect permission requests
SocietiesMember content licensing

Communication Channels ​

Internal ​

  • Email - Primary communication
  • Teams/Slack - Quick questions, team collaboration
  • RPC Comments - Project-specific discussions
  • Weekly Meetings - Team syncs, escalation reviews

External ​

  • Email - Formal permission requests
  • Publisher Portals - Online license systems
  • Phone - Escalations, urgent requests
  • CCC RightsLink - Automated licensing
